trans-unit.source: An airplane has two seats in the flight deck (for the pilot and co-pilot), and a number of rows of 1st class and 2nd class passenger seats. Each 1st class row contains four seats. Each 2nd class row contains five seats.
trans-unit.target: Un avió té dos seients en la cabina de vol (pel pilot i copilot) i un nombre de files per seients de passatgers de primera classe i de segona classe. Cada fila de primera classe conté quatre seients. Cada fila de segona classe conté cinc seients.

trans-unit.source: Build a formula (below) that calculates the total number of seats on the airplane as the rows are changed (above).
trans-unit.target: Construïu una fórmula (a sota) que calculi el nombre total de seients de l'avió a mida que canviïn les files (a dalt).

trans-unit.source: An airplane has two seats in the flight deck (for the pilot and co-pilot), and a number of rows of passenger seats. Each row contains four seats.
trans-unit.target: Un avió té dos seients en la cabina de vol (pel pilot i pel copilot) i un nombre de files de seients de passatgers. Cada fila conté quatre seients.

trans-unit.source: An airplane has a number of rows of passenger seats. Each row contains four seats.
trans-unit.target: Un avió té un nombre de files de seients de passatgers. Cada fila conté quatre seients.
